name: Track Adventures --DEMO
description:
This is a small Racing Game  I am working on, and I would be happy to hear some feedback on the game. 

(still prototype Version 0.0.2)

INFO:

I would recomend downloading the game, because it is und er constant rework and the export version gtes updated more often!!

Controls:

Accelerate : W

Slow Down / Drift : Space

Steer : A ; D
